ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup almond butter, room temperature

cookingTips: Melt coconut oil gently; whisk in cocoa powder thoroughly to avoid lumps
Bring almond butter to room temperature for smooth mixing and no lumps in final fudge
Pour into lined pan and refrigerate at least 2 hours; use parchment for easy removal and cutting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This no-bake fudge is simple and nutritious. The almond butter and honey provide richness while keeping sugar minimal compared to traditional fudge.
